author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL EXPECTED TO BECOME A DANGEROUS MAJOR HURRICANE BEFORE REACHING THE WINDWARD ISLANDS... ...HURRICANE WATCHES ISSUED...
summary:
...BERYL EXPECTED TO BECOME A DANGEROUS MAJOR HURRICANE BEFORE REACHING THE WINDWARD ISLANDS... ...HURRICANE WATCHES ISSUED...
 As of 11:00 AM AST Sat Jun 29
 the center of Beryl was located near 10.0, -47.8
 with movement W at 23 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 998 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.
